mapper.sql: id, provider_id, order_id, trajectory_desc, create_id, update_id, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into t_logistics_trajectory (provider_id, order_id, trajectory_desc, create_id, update_id, create_time, update_time ) values
(#{item.providerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.trajectoryDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select:
select
from t_logistics_trajectory where order_id=#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by create_time desc
